Internal Structure

General information about the VDC Blueprint
Overview
Name is required
Description is required
Method ID is required
Add at least one Tag
You need to add at least 1 item
Data Sources
ID is required

										

										
										
										
									

									

										
										

											

										

										
										
										
									

									

										
									


									

									

										You need to add at least 1 item
									


									

										
									

								

							

						

					


					

						

							

								

									
Method Inputs
This field contains the part of the data source that each method needs to be executed

									

										
										
									


									

										

											

												
Data Sources
The list of data sources required by the method


												

													
													
													
ID is required

												


												

													
													
												


												

												

													

														

															
Databases
The list of databases required by a method in a data source


															

																
																
																
ID is required

															


															

															

																

																	

																		
Tables
The list of tables/collections required by a method in a Data Source


																		

																			
																			
																			
ID is required

VDC Images

											Image is required

Resources
